text: Aap farma dijiya kay kiya mein Allah kay siwa kissi aur ko rab bananey kay liye talash keroon halankay woh maalik hai her cheez ka aur jo shaks bhi koi amal kerta hai woh ussi per rehta hai aur koi kissi doosray ka bojh na uthaye ga. Phir tum sab ko apney rab kay pass jana hoga. Phir woh tum ko jatlaye ga jiss jiss cheez mein tum ikhtilaf kertay thay
